name: T.P.F.C.T.W.D.K.W.T.C.I
description:
A short birthday present for our friend Chaoclypse, who is an indie game developer.

If you'd like to support our friend who makes legitimate games, you can check his Twitter. He's currently working on his first commercial game called Skull Chainz and you can wishlist it on steam! Do support him!

Controls

WSAD - to move
Spacebar - to interact
Left Mouse Click - to progress story/select options

・‥…━━━━━━━☆☆━━━━━━━…‥・

This game was made with the help of Chao's friends:
Character Art - Quantumtea
Environment  & UI - Lyroia
Programming - Jofer
Music - Vav, MobiusDisco, Ryunocore, PHI Φ

SFX was created using LabChirp !
